DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety feasibility novel deep TMS H-coil design treatment resistant major depression open study use two different H-coil design .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Deep Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) H-Coil Treatment Major Depression
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose suffer treatment resistant major depression Other axis I diagnosis Risk factor convulsion Electroconvulsive therapy ( ECT ) last 9 month History drug abuse past year
